findings.message:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract CoinvaToken (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#112-250) has payable functions:
	 - CoinvaToken.fallback() (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#238-240)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
findings.name: locked-ether

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.5.0 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage.
It is used by:
	- ^0.5.0 (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.5.17 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: Parameter MultiOwned.addOwner(address)._newOwner (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message:
CoinvaToken.constructor() (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#127-134) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 2500000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#131)
findings.name: too-many-digits

findings.message:
receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) should be declared external:
	- ApproveAndCallFallBack.receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#63)
Moreover, the following function parameters should change its data location:
data location should be calldata
findings.name: external-function

findings.message:
approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) should be declared external:
	- CoinvaToken.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) (0x715e0ed8658de08f06b059ff97956e874c8e4b1a.sol#227-232)
Moreover, the following function parameters should change its data location:
data location should be calldata
findings.name: external-function
